extractFactDictList.question: What company was at the center of the Facebook data scandal?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Cambridge Analytica, the U.K.-based political consulting firm at the center of the Facebook data scandal, announced on May 2, 2018, that it was "immediately ceasing all operations".
